data.title: work — SUSE MARQUARDT CASTING
data.text:
the mussel feast

"Das Muschelessen" is Birgit Vanderbeke's debut work, which was published in 1990 and for which she was awarded the Ingeborg Bachmann Prize, among other honours. Her story is anything but the depiction of an idyllic family meal; it is much more of a bitterly angry anti-idyll, a dismantling of the family and the father's authority, linked to a mussel dinner in a way that is as subtle as it is lustful.

directed by michael venus

script by michael venus, gro swantje kohlhof

produced by ostlicht

financing / casting

© fischer / berlinale

demons and dreams

tells the story of Denis, child of Polish immigrants, who, in a place of little hope, discovers his unique gift for making music and turns into one of the most popular hip hop beat producers of the present day.

directed by lena stahl

script by lena stahl, johanna thalmann

produced by tobis films

preproduction / casting

© babet mader / stefan klüter

der held vom bahnhof friedrichstrasse

a fast-paced, touching and immensely enjoyable impostor story. in september 2019, michael Hartung receives a visit from a journalist. he is researching a spectacular mass escape from the gdr, in which 127 people travelled to the west on an s-bahn train at friedrichstraße station.

directed by wolfgang becker

script by wolfgang becker, constantin lieb, based on the novel by maxim leo

produced by x-filme

preproduction / casting

© kiwi verlag / florian schneider

ich ist ein anderer

Felix Kersten, Heinrich Himmler's former masseur, is said to have helped thousands concentration camp prisoners to freedom through his influence with the Reichsführer SS. freedom through his influence with the Reichführer SS. The young socialist journalist Hedda does not believe Kersten and tries to convict him of lying...

directed by felix randau

script by felix randau

produced by ostlicht films

financing / casting

© ostlicht / sabine cattaneo

allegro pastell

allegro pastell is the story of a seemingly normal love and its transformations..

directed by anna roller

script by anna roller, based on the novel by leif randt

produced by walker&worm

filming

© kiwi verlag / privat

no beast so fierce

at the centre of the drama, which is based on william shakespeare's „the tragedy of king richard III" and whose plot is set in present-day neukölln, is the youngest daughter of an arab clan.

directed by burhan qurbani

script by burhan qurbani, enis maci, based on a play by william shakespeare

produced by sommerhaus filmproduktion

postproduction

cast at imdb

© port au prince pictures / malik vitthal

disappereance

Mengele’s fugitive years in South America told from his point of view. The notorious Nazi doctor found refuge in South America at the end of WWII and was never captured, dying in Brazil in 1979 without having been judged for his crimes..

directed by kiril serebrennikov

script by kiril serebrennikov, based on the novel “The Disappearance of Josef Mengele” by Olivier Guez

produced by lupa film, cg cinéma, hype studios , forma pro films, loreipsum corp., piano mexico, scala films

postproduction

cast at imdb

© lupa film / ira polyarnaya

nuremberg

nuremberg chronicles the eponymous trials held by the allied forces against the defeated nazi regime. fhe film will center on american psychiatrist douglas kelley, who is tasked with determining whether nazi prisoners are fit to stand trial for their war crimes and finds himself in a complex battle of wits with hermann göring, hitler's right-hand man.

directed by james vanderbilt

script by james vanderbilt, based on the book 'The Nazi and the Psychiatrist' by Jack El-Hai

produced by bluestone entertainment, wme independent, filmsquad, project x entertainment, walden media

german roles, co casting with john papsidera, anna kennedy

postproduction

cast at imdb

© bluestone entertainment, wme independent, filmsquad, project x entertainment, walden media

swedish connection

gösta engzell, a down prioritised bureaucrat at the swedish foreign ministry during the 2nd world war. when gösta and his team become aware that something terrible is happening to the Jews, they come up with a brilliant plan to fool the nazis. this is a swedish story of an unknown hero who saved thousands of lives and turned the so-called neutral sweden into a moral superpower along the way.

directed by thérèse ahlbeck , marcus olsson

script by thérèse ahlbeck , marcus olsson

german roles

produced by way feature films, netflix

postproduction

cast at imdb

© netflix

der tiger

the five-man crew of a german tiger tank is sent on a secret mission far behind the fiercely contested front line. fueled by the wehrmacht's methamphetamine, their mission increasingly becomes a journey into the heart of darkness .

directed by dennis gansel

script by dennis gansel, colin teevan

produced by pantaleon films, amazon

cast at imdb

postproduction

© amazon /jens koch

fresh

they say blood is thicker than water. and there is plenty of blood in this visually thrilling adaptation of mark mcnay's novel of the same name about two dissimilar brothers. kai was actually happy to no longer have mirko in his life. but when he gets out of prison and wants his money back, which kai has used for other purposes in the meantime, the situation threatens to escalate. brutal, bitterly evil brother ballad.

directed by damian john harper

script by damian john harper, based on the novel '“fresh” bei mark mcnay

produced by weydemann bros.

world premiere at filmfest munich

cast at cu

© port au prince pictures

oderbruch

a discovery of numerous murder victims in the eponymous region in germany takes ex-cop maggie kring and detective roland voit together after more than 20 years of separation to examine the case, which becomes a personal one for maggie.

directed by adolfo kolmerer, christian alvart

the gryphon

Based on the fantasy bestseller. To save humanity from the Gryphon's claws, outcast Mark must confront his family's dark legacy and enter a deadly battle in the parallel world of the Black Tower.

directed by sebastian marka, max zähle

script by erol yesilkaya, sebastian marka, boris dennulat, stefanie veith, based on a novel by wolfgang hohlbein,

produced by wiedemann & berg, doghouse film, amazon studios

in cooperation with patrick dreikauss

a thin line

Follows Ana and Benni, two sisters in a quest to expose environmental wrongdoing, but when things go bad after hacking a government server, a question arises: What line are you willing to cross for something you believe in?

directed by sabrina sarabi, damian john harper

script by jakob & jonas weydemann, stefanie ren, paul salisbury

produced by weydemann bros, paramount+

cast at imdb trailer

© paramount+:

der überfall

A robbery attempt at a small corner store ends fatally. A seven-year-old boy disappears and an envelope with a lot of money changes hands. The lives of people who have never had anything to do with each other collide violently..

directed by stephan lacant

script by stefan kolditz, katja wenzel

produced by ufa filmproduction, zdf

cast at imdb trailer

© zdf

a stasi comedy

After falling in love with the Nathalie and sleeping with his first target, Corinna, Ludger ends up living two lives - one as an underground poet and one as a Stasi agent - both of which eventually come back to haunt him 30 years later.

directed by leander haußmann

script by leander haußmann

produced by ufa

cast at imdb trailer

© constantin film

the funeral

For the funeral of the patriarch the Meurer clan reunites and clashes over who deserves which part of the inheritance. It does not take long until this emotional melting pot of incompatible dreams, desires and denial boils over.

directed by jan georg schütte

idea by jan georg schütte, improvisation by the actors

produced by florida film, ard degeto

cast at imdb trailer

© ard degeto / thomas leidig

blackout

On a cold November day, electricity fails all over Europe. Blackout. While the government and authorities struggle with the effects and with clarification, a former hacker comes into the focus of the investigators.

directed by lancelot von naso, oliver rihs

script by lancelot von naso, kai-uwe hasenheit, ased on a novel by max elsberg,

produced by wiedemann & berg tv, joyn

cast at imdb trailer

© joyn

für immer sommer 90

Summer 1990, Germany in the frenzy of reunification: In Brandenburg, Andy's youth clique uses the title win at the World Cup for a lively party at the lake: alcohol, drugs - film tears. What happened during the night takes on a new meaning 30 years later. Andy is now a successful investment banker and uses the Corona crisis to jump into his career. However, an anonymously written letter accuses him of raping a young woman and thus destroying her life.

directed by jan georg schütte

idea by jan georg schütte, charly hübner, lars lessen, improvised by the actors

produced by florida film, ard degeto

cast at imdb trailer

© ard degeto

A man from Guinea-Bissau moves to Germany, where he is befriended by a drug dealer and two women..

Year 2047: "Infinitalk" is the AI developed by some guys, offering possible eternal life through digitization of peoples mind and when they want to sell it, they get into major trouble..

script by erol yesilkaya, based on a story by simon urban

The grotesque, at times even surreal, true story of how the Iraq war was started based on nothing but fake intelligence and the involvement of the German government and the German secret service..

script by oliver keidel, johannes naber

cast at imdb trailer

tkkg

the third film based on the famous TKKG series of books for young people. When Willi's father is abducted and is only released for a valuable statue from his art collection, Tim is the only one who believes Willi that the police are on the wrong track. Together with the smart policeman's daughter Gaby and the highly intelligent outsider Karl, they start to investigate on their own. Against all odds the four discover a conspiracy. In the course of their first big detective adventure they grow together into a committed community, and so Tim, Klöschen, Karl and Gaby become the band TKKG.

directed by robert thalheim

script by robert kalmuczak, peter klehmet, robert thalheim

produced by kundschafter film, warner bros

in ccoperation with jaqueline rietz

cast at imdb trailer

© warner bros

cut off

Thriller set in the world of Forensic Pathology. Coroner Paul Herzfeld finds a capsule in the head of a heavily mutilated corpse, containing a phone number and single word: the name of his daughter.

directed by christian alvart

script by sebastian fitzek, michael tsokos, christian alvart, based on a thriller by sebastian fitzek and michael tsokos

produced by syrreal filmproduction, ziegler film, warner bros

cast at imdb trailer

© warner bros

the vanishing

20-year-old Janine disappears without a trace, and her mother is the only one who is convinced that something happened to her daughter; left to her own devices, she has to piece together a puzzle to try to find her daughter.

directed by hans-christian schmid

script by bernd lange, hans-christian schmid

produced by 23/5 film, ard

cast at imdb trailer

© ard / amazon prime video

mission love

Hans calls his girlfriend Heinz, which tells you everything you need to know about their relationship. They're a typical couple who're stuck in a rut after eight years.. The thing is clear: the two have to do something. How can this be love? They decide to make a list of everything that makes up a real love: Romance, desire, passion, jealousy, drama - deep feelings, in other words. Hans and Heinz methodically start checking off their list and realize: Real life is nothing like the movies.

directed by laura lackmann

script by laura lackmann

produced by studio tv, swr, wdr

cast at imdb trailer

© farbfilm verleih / jack twist

Do You Sometimes Feel Burned Out and Empty?

Marriage counselor Luisa is happily married to Richard, but also has an affair with Leopold, Richard's boss. Luisa can't decide which man to choose, until she wakes up one morning and meets a second Luisa, calling herself Ann.

directed by lola randl

script by lola randl

produced by coin film

cast at imdb trailer

Magical Mystery or: The Return of Karl Schmidt

Years after a nervous breakdown Karl goes on tour with old friends and upcoming electronic music DJs. Beeing the only sober person in a environment full of drugs and alcohol starts to bring back demons.

script by jakob m erwa, based on a novel by andreas steinhöfel

the confessions

Ministers from the G8 countries meet in Germany to decide on a secret plan affecting many countries. IMF director Roché has invited a monk for his confession. Roché's later found dead. Is it murder or suicide? Did he reveal the plan?.

A loving mother searching for her child. A pregnant woman escaping from her responsibility. Two women who couldn't be more different will be pushed to their limits of humanity. Connected by one breath which decides everything.

becks letzter sommer

A frustrated music teacher and former musician discovers in a pupil a talent for guitar playing and singing and decides to help him into the music business. In the process, the teacher changes also his own life

directed by frieder wittich

script by frieder wittich, oliver ziegenbalg, based on a novel by benedict wells

produced by claussen & putz

cast at imdb trailer

© wild bunch

home for the weekend

Marko is in his mid-thirties, has just published his first book, and has been living in Berlin since his university days - far enough away from his parents Gitte and Günter whose bourgeois lifestyle he could never quite get used to. He visits them once or twice a year, mainly to give them a chance to spend a few days with their grandson. His hopes of spending a quiet weekend with the family fall short when Gitte, who has been mentally unstable since Marko was a child, feels so healthy after a homeopathic treatment that she stops taking her medication. Her announcement triggers reserved reactions in the family, and a series of revelations tip his family's structure out of balance.

directed by hans-christian schmid

script by bernd lange

produced by 23/5 film

cast at imdb trailer

© pandora film

4 days in may

A group of Russian soldiers are sent into Northern Germany at the tail-end of WWII, where they occupy a children's home in close proximity to a larger German unit. Against these odds, a friendship forms between a German orphan and a childless Soviet captain

directed by Achim von Borries

script by Achim von Borries, Eduard Reznik

produced by xfilme, ZAO Studia "F.A.F"

cast at imdb trailer

© x-verleih

songs of love and hate

In an idyllic wine region at the foot of the Swiss Alps lives Rico with his two daughters and his wife Anna. The charming daughter, Lili, brings turbulence into the so far harmonious family life because of the awakening of her sexuality. Her father sees her with new eyes and starts to distance himself from her. Lili feels rejected from her father and reacts with aggression and power games..

directed by Katalin Gödrös

script by Dagmar Gabler, Katalin Gödrös

produced by cobra film

cast at imdb trailer

© cobra film / missing films

66/67 Fairplay is over

For six young men, who could hardly be more different from one another, the fan club of the Eintracht Braunschweig football club is the center of their life and their friendship. 66/67 is the name of their club as well as the year in which Eintracht Braunschweig won the German Championship.

directed by Jan-Christoph Glaser, Carsten Ludwig

script by Jan-Christoph Glaser, CARsten Ludwig

produced by frisbeefilms

cast at imdb trailer

© FARBFILM VERLEIH

13 semester

The friends Moritz and Dirk get accepted at the TU Darmstadt and leave their small home village in Brandenburg to set out for the big town to study business arithmetic (mathematical economics).

directed by Frieder Wittich

script by Frieder Wittich, Oliver Ziegenbalg

produced by claussen & putz film

max manus

The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons..

In the 60s, a family from the GDR who came to settle in West Germany before the construction of the Berlin Wall gradually tears apart.

directed by Neele Leana Vollmar

script by Ruth Toma, based on a novel by Birgit Vanderbeke

produced by royal pony film, odeon film, neue kinowelt

absurdistan

An allegorical comedy centered on two childhood sweethearts who seem destined for one another until the women of their isolated village, angered by male indifference toward the water shortage, go on a sex strike that threatens the young couple's first night of love.

directed by veit helmer

script by Zaza Buadze, Servet Golbol, Veit Helmer

produced by veit helmer film

cast at imdb trailer

© farbfilm verleih

eight miles high

Uschi Obermeier, a German cover model from the 1960s who embodied the dreams of the hippie generation - joins a commune, begins a modelling career, meets rock stars, and travels the world in a bus, enjoying love, drugs and freedom.

directed by akiz

script by Olaf Kraemer, Akiz, Claus Peter Hant

produced by bioskop film

cast at imdb trailer

© warner bros

let the cat out of the bag

Waitress Doris meets a stranger on a train to Leipzig. This well-dressed thirty-something man decides to follow her, as they are drawn to each other, but neither seem prepared to admit to their loneliness

directed by florian schwarz

script by michael proehl

produced by frisbeefilms
